Package model

Provides all classes for the controller component.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimateSprite
    The AnimateSprite class animates pictures The AnimateSprite class animates pictures The class AnimateSprite consists to make a movement for a picture
    BubbleKey
    BubbleKey is the class representative the necessary key to open the door BubbleKey is the class representative the necessary key to open the door The BubbleKey consists to instantiate an object BubbleKey with : An x and y coordinates to locate on a map A url to connect the key to an image format . png And a list to give him a permeability.
    Coins
    The coins class represents a loot that can be retrieve to earn points The class coins consists to instantiate an object coins with: An x and y coordinates to locate on a map.
    DBConnection
    The Class DBConnection.
    DBGame  
    Demon
    Demon is the class representative the artificial intelligence of game that one should avoid The Demon consists to instantiate an object Demon with : An x and y coordinates to locate on a map.
    Door
    The Door class represents the access to the end of the level The class Door consists to instantiate an object Door with: An x and y coordinates to locate on a map A url to connect the door to an image format . png And a list to give him a permeability
    Element
    The Element class introduces elements based on 3 criteria : An x and y coordinates to locate on a map at the start of the game.
    Example
    The Class Example.
    Floor
    The Floor class represents the wallpaper of the game The class Floor consists to instantiate an object Floor with: An x and y coordinates to locate on a map.
    Game
    The Game class represents the entire game The Game class represents the entire game The class Game consists to: Download the map Download the database
    Loot
    The Loot class represents all objects that the user can take The Loot class represents all objects that the user can take The class Loot consists to create many object with: A url to connect the loot to an image format . png.
    Lorann
    The Lorann class represents the main character that the user plays The class Lorann consists to instantiate an object Lorann with: An x and y coordinates to locate on a map at the start of the game.
    Map
    The Map class represents the whole map The class Map consists to instantiate an object with : A dimension of map.
    MobileElement  
    ModelFacade
    The Class ModelFacade provides a facade of the Model component.
    Spell
    The Spell class represents the sorcery that the player can launch The class Spell consists to instantiate an object Spell with: An x and y coordinates to locate on a map the spell.
    Sprite
    This class Sprite is used to assign a picture to an item This class Sprite is used to assign a picture to an item The Sprite consists to: Assigned an image with an url
    StaticElement
    This class StaticElement is used to define the mobility of the object The StaticElement consists take into account: >A url to connect the object to an image format . png.
    Wall
    The Wall class represents the structure of the map The Wall class represents the structure of the map The class Wall consists to instantiate an object Wall with: An x and y coordinates to locate on a map.
